alert.note: Alert for Bienville; Bossier; Lincoln; Webster (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued November 04 at 10:51PM CDT until November 04 at 11:30PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a * Tornado Warning for... Southeastern Webster Parish in northwestern Louisiana... Bienville Parish in northwestern Louisiana... Southeastern Bossier Parish in northwestern Louisiana... Southwestern Lincoln Parish in north central Louisiana... * Until 1130 PM CDT. * At 1050 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located near Ringgold, or 18 miles south of Minden, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * This dangerous storm will be near... Ringgold and Heflin around 1100 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this tornadic thunderstorm include Castor, Curtis, Lake Bistineau South, Brice, Plum Orchard Landing, Lucky, Koran, Jamestown, Liberty Hill and Sailes. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
